sentence: In a letter to Health and Human Services Secretary Xavier Becerra, Reps. James Comer, R-Ky., and Jim Jordan, R-Ohio, pointed to a Feb. 1, 2020, conference call that included Fauci and former National Institutes of Health Director Francis Collins in which the virus's origins were discussed.
author: Ronn Blitzer
title: Reps. Comer, Jordan expose new Fauci emails they say point to COVID-19 lab leak 'cover up'

author: Sam Dorman
title: HHS, NIH under fire from House GOP seeking answers on Wuhan's COVID origins

sentence: Comer and Rep. Jim Jordan, R-Ohio, published portions of emails last month revealing Fauci knew that COVID-19 may have been intentionally modified and leaked from the Wuhan Institute of Virology.
title: Rep. Comer accuses Fauci, CCP of covering up COVID origins 'from day one': 'Is he a mad scientist?'

sentence: Rep. Jim Jordan, R-Ohio, on Tuesday said that investigating Dr. Anthony Fauci, the country's leading expert on infectious disease, will be one of his top priorities if the GOP retakes the House in this year's midterm elections.
author: Jon Skolnik
title: Jim Jordan promises to investigate Dr. Fauci if GOP retakes the House this year

sentence: Rep. Jim Jordan, R-Ohio, on Tuesday said that investigating Dr. Anthony Fauci, the country's leading expert on infectious disease, will be one of his top priorities if the GOP retakes the House in this year's midterm elections.
author: Jon Skolnik
title: Jim Jordan vows to 'investigate' Anthony Fauci if GOP retakes Congress
